text: We evaluated the influence of QT measurement and QTc computation methodology on the proposed QTc - quality tests .METHODS : The baseline ECG waveforms and fiducial points were retrieved from 34 crossover TQT studies that had full - day baseline ECGs prior to each study period .
label: Background

text: The influence of QTc computation methodology was investigated by applying the pattern - matching technique and/or using the 10-s average heart rate .CONCLUSION :The findings suggest that QTc quality is mostly driven by the QTc measurement methodology rather than other study - related factors .
